words.example: I want to be a teacher in the future.
words.translation: 我将来想成为一名老师。

words.memoryTip: pilot 开飞机，pilot 很厉害！

words.example: My mother is a good cook.
The taxi driver is very friendly.
words.memoryTip: taxi（出租车）+ driver（司机）= taxi driver

words.example: She wants to be a singer.
The apple falls from the tree.
The lifeguard helps people at the beach.
words.translation: 救生员在海滩帮助人们。
words.memoryTip: life（生命）+ guard（守卫）= lifeguard（救生员）

words.example: I want to become a doctor.
I go to school by bus.
I walk to school every day.
I study at a primary school.
words.memoryTip: primary（初级的）+ school（学校）= primary school（小学）

words.example: I take the underground to school.
I take the bus to school.
I wait at the bus stop.
words.memoryTip: bus（公共汽车）+ stop（站）= bus stop

words.example: My school is far from my home.
I go to the park on foot.
I go to school by bike.
My father goes to work by car.
I get off the bus at the school.
I go to a birthday party.
When do you go to school?

words.memoryTip: bring（带来）和 thing（东西）容易混淆，bring 是动作
thing（东西）和 bring（带来）容易混淆，thing 是名词

words.translation: 苹果是我最喜欢的水果。

words.example: We have fun at the party.
words.translation: 我们在聚会上玩得很开心。

words.example: I am the first in the race.

words.memoryTip: five（五）→ fifth（第五），注意 ve 变 f 再加 th

words.example: I am in the sixth grade.

words.memoryTip: eight（八）+ th = eighth（第八），注意只有一个 t
nine（九）→ ninth（第九），去掉 e 加 th
twelve（十二）→ twelfth（第十二），注意 ve 变 f 再加 th
twenty（二十）→ twentieth（第二十），y 变 ie 加 th
thirty（三十）→ thirtieth（第三十），y 变 ie 加 th

words.example: I usually go to school at seven.
I never go to bed late.
My mother goes shopping on Sunday.
We are in the same class.
First I read, then I write.
I ask the teacher a question.
I make phone calls to my friends.
We watch TV in the living room.
words.memoryTip: living（生活）+ room（房间）= living room（客厅）

words.example: My mother cooks in the kitchen.
I brush my teeth in the bathroom.
words.memoryTip: bath（洗澡）+ room（房间）= bathroom（浴室）

words.example: I watch TV in the evening.

words.memoryTip: bed（床）+ time（时间）= bedtime（就寝时间）

words.example: I do my homework every day.
My mother tells me a story.
We enjoy the sunshine on the beach.
words.memoryTip: sun（太阳）+ shine（照耀）= sunshine（阳光）

words.translation: 我找到一个漂亮的贝壳。

words.example: I write a letter to my friend.
Put the book on the desk.
We go to the beach on holiday.
We have a good time at the beach.
words.translation: 我们在海滩玩得很开心。

words.example: There is a hill over there.
There is a hole in the wall.
This is the key to the door.
The flag is at the top of the hill.
I send a letter at the post office.
words.memoryTip: post（邮政）+ office（办公室）= post office（邮局）
quite（相当）和 quiet（安静的）容易混淆，quite 是副词

words.example: The book is on the left.
The book is between two pens.
My mother buys flowers at the flower shop.
words.memoryTip: flower（花）+ shop（商店）= flower shop（花店）

words.example: My father works in a hospital.
I buy toys at the toy shop.
words.memoryTip: toy（玩具）+ shop（商店）= toy shop（玩具店）

words.example: How do I get to the school?
The windmill turns in the wind.
The wind-bell makes a nice sound.

words.memoryTip: quiet（安静的）和 quite（相当）容易混淆，quiet 是形容词
use（使用）+ ful（充满的）= useful（有用的）

words.example: The bridge is over the river.
The apple falls to the ground.
The cat is inside the box.
The fire can burn down the house.
I don't like it at all.
There are twelve months in a year.
There is a fly on the table.
I want to grow up quickly.
I will go to junior high school next year.
words.memoryTip: junior（初级的）+ high school（中学）= junior high school（初级中学）
